price: ߕߊ-ߡߍߣߍ߲ ߣߌ߫ ߘߊ߬ߢߊ߲߬ߖߌ ߘߌ߫ ߟߊߜߘߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍߣߊ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ ߠߊ߫
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yur'salu ʿalaykumā shuwāẓun min nārin wanuḥāsun falā tantaṣirāni
translations: you will (be able to) defend yourselves
